# highlights-tokens

A list of the language tokens used by the Atom.app [highlights](https://www.npmjs.com/package/highlights) syntax highlighter

```
actionpack
activerecord
activesupport
aggregate
alias
alter
anchor
any
any-method

array
assertion
assignment
at-rule
attribute-name

c
```
